text: kmean krohthnak namuoy ban thleak mk leu phendei laey haeyka kmean krohthnak namuoy ban thleak towleu puok anak der leuk leng te ban kttra touk nowknong kompir( lav ho l mah hvou sa) mounnung yeung ban bangkeut vea bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa teangnoh kuchea kar ngeayosruol bamphot champoh a l laoh
